Classification: Reality
Genre: Buy, Sell & Trade | Comedy | Educational
Status: Returning Series
Network: AMC ( USA)
Airs: Sundays at 11:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: February 12, 2012
Episode Order: 16

The series is called Comic Book Men and will take place in Kevin Smith's comic book store - "Jay & Silent Bob's Secret Stash". AMC has set the premiere of the show for February 12th
